Articles.Content:
This idea for a mod just popped into my head, so I had to share it.

I was thinking of re-inforced landing legs, Like Legs like the LT-2 Landing legs, but that look a bit different, and can survive below 50m/s crash.

That's actually kind of it. Just an idea.

EDIT: I was actually also kinda thinking make it really expensive like 4,000 dollars or something, Because, 50m/s is it's limit? Danm!

I don't care if someone makes the mod and edits it to be 40m/s limit, or changes the cost, It's just a general idea.

Have fun with it modders! Change it anyway ya want!

Ehm ... 50 m/s is almost 180 km/h.

I say no.

No to what? It's a mod request. Unless you are mod developer you don't get to say no.

OP: I seem to recall NovaPunch had some rather ridiculously strong landing legs at one time. It's been a long time since I've used it though.

Karbonite has 16 m/s landing legs (with lights!).

SpaceY has 20 m/s landing legs.

Civilian Population has gigantic 80 m/s landing legs.

I'm not sure why you'd want to land so fast. You'd still have to kill your horizontal velocity so that you don't tumble, so it would really only be useful for dropping straight down.
